content.query:
select * 
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'raw/calendar.csv',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as cal


   EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'select * 
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK ''raw/calendar.csv'',
    FORMAT=''CSV'',
    DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
    PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) as cal'


select * 
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'raw/calendar.csv',
    FORMAT='CSV',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE
) 
with(
    date_key INT,
    date    date,
    year    SMALLINT,
    month   TINYINT,
    day     TINYINT,
    day_name    VARCHAR(10),
    day_of_year SMALLINT,
    week_of_month   TINYINT,
    week_of_year    TINYINT,
    month_name  VARCHAR(10),
    year_month  INT,
    year_week   INT
)
as cal
